page.title: 10Steephill Cove
page.content: Steephill cove is a natural,small cove with a nice sandy beach.{The Blake and {Spencer Families}continue the long established family fishing business from here.The fishing boat'Compromise' built by the Blakes was launched in Dec.84.This may possibly be the last wooden boat to be built since the elm and spruce timbers are unobtainable. {Compromise}was also used this year in the rescue of the pilot and passengers from the light aircraft which crashed into the sea near Ventnor pier.When Mr.Blake,an Auxillary Coastguard, got the emergency call,'Compromise' was on the scene within seconds. The newly installed radio was used to alert the helicopter rescue team of the serious condition of a baby.This prompt action resulted in the baby being admitted to Hasler Naval Hospital,Southampton within sixteen minutes.
